pada malawa - mahagamasekarasangithaya – amaradewagayanaya - newil pranandu samangalos kabaleroschithrapataya - delowak athara************************************************rajina mamayi ape rajje rajina mamayi - rajina mamayi – rajina mamayi ape rajje mage samiya raja thamayi ohuge anata kaleth saleyi gasuth waluth galuth nameyi ape rajje rajina mamayi ape rajjesebalu apiyi ape rajje sebalu apiyi - sebalu apiyi sebalu apiyi ape rajjeee kandath ape thamayi - me kandath ape thamayi kandu yayama ape thamayi ape rajje rajina mamayi ape rajjesebalu apiyi ape rajje sebalu apiyi - sebalu apiyi - sebalu apiyi ape rajajeape bale kaduwe bale - ape bale dunne bale ape bale samangi bale ape rajje rajina mamayi ape rajje rajina mamayi - rajina mamayi ape rajje  pada malawa - arisen ahubuduthanuwa - sunil shanthasangithaya – aar.

eeta amatharawa ohuta rajaye gasthu gewimata da niyama kalaya. 2002 juni masa 16 wanida hemmathagama polisiyedi me manthriwarayata wiruddhawa aarawulak sambandha paminillak wibhaga wemin thibiyadi paminilikaru wana ashoka gunasekara mahathata polisiya thuladi paharadima, ohuta marana tharjanaya kirima, paminili wibhaga kala polis niladharinta banawadi apahasa kirima yana chodana yatathe hemmathagama polisiya wisin mema naduwa gonu kota thibuni.

pe.wa. mama methandi arunith ekka ekangayi.chinaye deshapalana wiruddhawadin adhikarana wihiluwakin pasu mara damanne owunta sthri dushana chodana ella karala kiyala mama ahala thiyanawa.sthridushanaya yanu minimarima wage ekak noweyi.aththatama ema sansargayata sthriyage kamaththa nothibunada yanna sewima wadagath.nathnam kamaththen anacharaye yedila passe minihawa blak mel karanna puluwan.api paththarawala dakinawa ee wage dewal.eewage sthrinta adhikarana thadin awawada karanawa habayi chodanawa oppu wunanam aru ellum gas.waiwahika sthridushana chodanawaladi wiwahaka samiyantath ellumgas yame chans eka issarahata eyi.

rajaye sewakayange jiwana wiyadam dimanawa ru. 1200 kin ihala nanwimata ha 2014 janawari sita ru.1250kata noadu gowi wishrama watupak labadimata piyawara ganna bawa 2014 aya-waya idiripath karamin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha parlimenthuwedi eeye (21) prakasha kaleya.kisiwitekath paudgalikaranaya anumatha nokarana wathman rajaya paudgalikaranaya kala wyapara nawatha pawara gena eewa laba labana wyapara bawata path kara athi bawa mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasiya.shri lankan guwan sewaya, rakshana samagama, telikom, hiltan hotalaya, gas, sewanagala sini karmantha shalawa athulu wyapara rasak rajayata labhansha gewana thaththwayata pathwa athi bawa da janadhipathithuma pawasiya.2014 aya waya parlimenthuwata idiripath karamin janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha eeye (21) ese prakasha kaleya.rajya sewaya kappadu karamin rajaye depala wikuna damme yugayata thitha thaba atha.2014 aya waya hingaya 5.2% dakwa pahatha dama athi bawa da pawasu janadhipathithuma 2015 di ayawaya aya waya hingaya 4.5% dakwath 2016 di ayawaya hingaya 3.8% dakwath adu kirima rajaye aramuna bawa da pawasiya.esema 2016 wana wita rajaye naya 65% dakwa adu kirimata da rajaya apeksha karayi.wayasa awurudu 63 ta wadi gowin sandaha 2014 janawari sita ru.1250kata noadu gowi wisha්rama watupak arambaana bawa da janadhipathithuma pawasiya.

ee nisa janathawage sanwedikama, nodannakama pawichchi karala karana me nithi wirodhi wade nathara kirima wagakiwa yuthu rajayaka yuthukama.
eyata pilithuru washayen shreshtadhikaranaya kale janadhipathiwaraya athadanguwata gena thaman wetha idiripath karanna’yi nithipathita niyoga kirimayi.

eksath jathika pakshaye awasan jana hamuwa heta (02) paswaruwe paksha nayaka ranil wikramasinhage pradhanathwayen maradana – dins paredi pawathwimata niyamithayi.

balaya aththanomathika lesa yoda noganima, gnyathi sangrahaye noyedima, nithiya kriyathmaka kirimata balapam nokirima, mahajana mudal awabhawitha nokirima, mahajana mudal mankolla nokama, wancha dushanawala noyedima, siya katayuthu paradrushya aakarayen kirima men ma hama wita ma mahajana mithuru praweshayak anugamanaya kirima ee muladharma hatiyata sakewin sandahan kala haki ya.
